org.apache.ecs.filter
Class CharacterFilter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
          org.apache.ecs.filter.CharacterFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, org.apache.ecs.Filter
public class CharacterFilter
extends java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
implements org.apache.ecs.Filter

This class creates a Filter object. The default characters filtered are:
" ' & < >

For example: 


    Filter filter = new CharacterFilter();
    filter.addAttribute("$","dollar");
    filter.addAttribute("#",Entities.POUND);

    P p = new P();
    p.setFilter(filter);

    Document doc = new Document();
    doc.getBody().addElement(p);
The filter is applied when the addElement() method is called.

Version:
$Id: CharacterFilter.java,v 1.2 2006/07/30 00:54:03 jjanke Exp $
Author:
Stephan Nagy, Jon S. Stevens
